body:
Comment 12: 
The /c/go/bin and /c/go/bin/go-tool directories are created.

The /c/go/bin/go-tool directory is populated correctly. However, the /c/go/bin directory
is not populated correctly; the commands are installed in /c/go/src. 

---
Installed Go for windows/386 in /c/go.
Installed commands in /c/go/src.
*** You need to add /c/go/src to your $PATH. ***
